title: Wall Street Breakfast: The Week Ahead
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Consumers should get ready for major sales in the retail sector with Amazon (AMZN) Prime Day, alongside competitor events. All eyes are on inflation this week, with consumer price and producer price reports both due in. Delta Air Lines (DAL) kicks off the earnings season for the airline sector.
